pesticide.PPE: Some materials that are chemical-resistant to this product are natural rubber. If you want more options, follow the instructions for category A on an EPA chemical-resistance category selection chart. Applicators and other handlers must wear: long-sleeved shirt and long pants, shoes and socks, chemical-resistant gloves such as natural rubber blends, barrier, barrier laminate, neoprene rubber or Viton. Applicators may choose not to wear protective eyewear with dilution rates greater than 5:1 or greater than 5 parts of water to 1 part of product. Mixers and loaders must wear: protective eyewear, long-sleeved shirt and long pants, shoes and socks, chemical-resistant gloves such as natural rubber blends, barrier laminate, neoprene rubber or Viton, and chemical-resistant apron when mixing or loading, cleaning up spills or equipment, or otherwise exposed to the concentrate.

Safety_Information.general_Info: See attached booklet for complete Precautionary Statements and Directions for Use (including First Aid, Agricultural Use Requirements, and Storage and Disposal). KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN DANGER - PELIGRO
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15 - 20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Probable mucosal damage may contraindicate the use of gastric lavage.
